html:
8.14.22  4:46 pm   What's your opinion on trains?

      an instant classic

8.14.22  3:31 pm   How to become?

      you'll never know until you're doing it. which you already are

8.14.22  1:52 pm   freakin anxious as heck over here, any advice on how to lesson feelings of anxiety?

      do something. OR, .... if you've already been doing things, do nothing. basically switch the something/nothing status of what you are doing

8.14.22  12:03 pm   How can I put theme into something without it sticking out

      theme probably does not want to be put. the trick here is to deal with all the other things, not the theme. deal with the objects. deal with logistics. pragmatism. deal with the size of the page itself. the theme will be like whatever mood you were in while doing it. if you want to change the theme directly then you're gonna have to figure out how to change your mood

8.14.22  10:32 am   how do i fix my boredom

      the problem is too many things are fixed. when some things start getting un-fixed, then things will get more interesting

8.14.22  9:01 am   Opinions on questions

      they're pretty good

8.14.22  8:47 am   favorite stage of grief?

      understanding

8.14.22  6:30 am   where do you find your ideas to make a song

      everywhere

8.14.22  5:37 am   do you sleep on your bed horizontally or vertically?

      that depends on the orientation of your measuring system

8.14.22  3:53 am   is the last word in your next song "see" ?

      no

8.14.22  2:26 am   how to be happy 

      by moving between the familiar and unfamiliar, in a pattern that changes between being predictable and unpredictable, at a pace which changes between changing and staying the same

8.13.22  11:57 pm   How does your humor balance between being too stimulating and not stimulating enough?

      just keep switching it. and then not switching it. switch between switching and not switching

8.13.22  11:40 pm   Any back-to-school tips?

      the key to back-to-school is paying very close attention to where the school was, as you were leaving it

8.13.22  10:03 pm   favorite trig identity?

      triangle

8.13.22  9:57 pm   What's the last letter in your next song?

      e

8.13.22  8:46 pm   was the piano on '9 8 7' a grand piano?

      bland piano

8.13.22  8:38 pm   just finished a 738 page novel-- one of the hardest in the english language-- i think the author was one of the greatest writers to have ever lived. i have no idea what to do now. in about two weeks i'm gonna be in college again. it is consuming me. i have no idea what to do with this novel in my head now. finishing it should've been this big, life-changing event. i should feel accomplished. many people have tried and given up because it's so hard. i can brag about it. but i feel empty now.

i want to write but my head is empty. and all i can write is short stories from the perspective of a suicidal character who i'm not a hundred percent sure isn't just a fictional proxy for myself

     maybe you could write 5 or 10 of those just to get it out of your system and then maybe new ideas will start creeping in

      i want to write but i won't have the time to.

it's embarrassing, actually. it's like how have you read Joyce and you're this bad at writing. the standard's right there, in front of you. he wrote the greatest stylistic guide of the 20th century. it's right there. how are you still writing clunky prose and how are you overusing clichéd phrases and how are you writing such pointless, onanistic, autofellatious, pretentious, angsty-adolescent-male bullshit.

mine isn't the story of a secret literary genius stuck in academia struggling to write myway out. i'm just a guy who doesn't want to study, who also happens to be a below-average writer.

     i think you may need some reverse psychology to get out of this. have you ever tried writing the 'wrong' story

8.13.22  8:37 pm   I keep getting stimulated by things that dont matter. How can I get stimulated by things that do matter and are exciting to work on?

      make a list of things that matter. if you can't think of anything, then start making a list of all the things that don't matter. that will be fun too and there may be some surprises in there

8.13.22  8:19 pm   what if the world was made of pudding

      (third eye blind "jumper" voice) "i would understaaand"

8.13.22  8:11 pm   Maj7#5?

      now that's what i call a 'coherent question'

8.13.22  7:50 pm   Are the buffalo bills going to win the Super Bowl?

      i will admit it's possible

8.13.22  6:39 pm   what time do you usually answer submitted questions?

      Monday, August 15, 2022 4:28:41 PM

8.13.22  6:12 pm   why don't we fall off the sides of the earth?

      why would anything fall anywhere? actually, nevermind, why would anything be anywhere, or exist? supposing that anything that does exist is indeed somewhat biased in favor of existing (instead of non-existing).... the 'falling' (toward each other) seems to be the force of that bias. the anythings moving in relation to each other (toward, away, etc) is the only way they can feel their existence. i suppose if the anythings were truly unbiased about which way they're falling, they would not even be registered in this reality. anyway, getting back to the main point, we fall toward earth because we prefer being here instead of outer space

8.13.22  2:02 pm   do you like writing in 7/4 time

      it's like rainbows. "sometimes it happens"

8.13.22  1:38 pm   help ive being held captive by penguins

      ok, i'll be right over

8.13.22  1:32 pm   every song you've made this year so far is a bop, with the amount of bop exponentially increasing. How are you achieving this?

      i'm insecure

8.13.22  9:30 am   mean, median, or mode?

      the mean, which is meadiode

8.13.22  6:58 am   opinions on money?

      it's fine, in principle

8.13.22  1:11 am   is the second word of your next song "want?"

      no

8.12.22  10:17 pm   opinion on onions

      too good. ignore

8.12.22  8:14 pm   how did you end up with so many songs to select a finalist from?

      i write a lot, but in most cases the song is only 10% written or less, at the time it is selected

8.12.22  8:53 pm   what's your favorite music key?

      each one makes the others better. there's nothing i can do about that

8.12.22  6:20 pm   can i trust that a road sign is going to help me evade roads or are they deceiving me?

      the orange ones that say 'detour', that is the one that will help you evade a specific road

8.12.22  6:11 pm   how many chord changes are acceptable

      about 20 per minute, but, they should NOT be evenly distributed. actually they should change between being evenly distributed and not evenly distributed

8.12.22  3:58 pm   what year did your harpsichord turn into an acoustic guitar?

      about 2012

8.12.22  3:26 pm   how can i be more like you?

      i'm not sure. i'm not sure how i am

8.12.22  12:09 pm   how to escape printer

      cancel all jobs

8.12.22  10:34 am   is the second word of your next song "going?"

      no

8.12.22  9:01 am   how to learn anything? i've recently realized that many learning resources i've used have taught me nothing, what do i do

      you might have to actually do the thing

8.12.22  7:51 am   how hard do you think it is to sing your songs?

      it's just like living life

8.12.22  5:26 am   Opinion on sailboats?

      pretty fast, at least compared to a snailboat

8.12.22  3:49 am   what do you do when you cant sleep or want to get up but it's too early in the morning

      go ahead and accomplish some goals

8.12.22  2:00 am   what is your opinion on rough clothing

      too soft

8.12.22  12:34 am   how much do you game

      it's all done. i gamed it all

8.11.22  9:57 pm   when you work on a music video, do you have all those little details and flourishes in your mind from the start, or do they just get thrown in spontaneously when it feels right? maybe both?

      that depends when is 'the start'

8.11.22  8:53 pm   What's the weather like today?

      inconsolable

8.11.22  7:38 pm   ive talked to other musicians about this and it's something I've experienced before too where right before i fall asleep i hear very complex good sounding melodies in my head. other musicals say the same thing happens to them, does this happen to you?

      yes

      to

8.11.22  12:43 pm   why is everything so strong?

      to balance with how strong you are

8.11.22  8:45 am   Estimate the percentage of internet culture that is just memes.

      on the internet there's no such thing as memes
